Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
AnimationTracks = {} ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
InputCheck = Instance.new("ScreenGui") InputCheck.Name = "InputCheck" InputButton = Instance.new("ImageButton") InputButton.Name = "InputButton" InputButton.Image = "" InputButton.BackgroundTransparency = 1 InputButton.ImageTransparency = 1 InputButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) InputButton.Parent = InputCheck
Sounds = { Wind = Handle:WaitForChild("Wind"), }
Gravity = workspace.Gravity Rate = (1 / 60)
Flying = false MouseDown = false ToolEquipped = false
function CheckTableForString(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if string.find(string.lower(String), string.lower(v)) then return true end end return false end
function CheckIntangible(Hit) local ProjectileNames = {"Water", "Arrow", "Projectile", "Effect", "Rail", "Laser", "Bullet"} if Hit and Hit.Parent then if ((not Hit.CanCollide or CheckTableForString(ProjectileNames, Hit.Name)) and not Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")) then return true end end return false end
function CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Length, Ignore, DelayIfHit) local Ignore = ((type(Ignore) == "table" and Ignore) or {Ignore}) local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(StartPos, Vec * Length), Ignore) if RayHit and CheckIntangible(RayHit) then if DelayIfHit then wait() end RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = CastRay((RayPos + (Vec * 0.01)), Vec, (Length - ((StartPos - RayPos).magnitude)), Ignore, DelayIfHit) end return RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal end
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(AnimationTracks) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(AnimationTracks, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(AnimationTracks, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(AnimationTracks) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop(value.FadeTime) table.remove(AnimationTracks, i) end end end end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Jump"):Connect(function() Humanoid.Jump = false end) end end
function GetAllConnectedParts(Object) local Parts = {} local function GetConnectedParts(Object) for i, v in pairs(Object:GetConnectedParts()) do local Ignore = false for ii, vv in pairs(Parts) do if v == vv then Ignore = true end end if not Ignore then table.insert(Parts, v) GetConnectedParts(v) end end end GetConnectedParts(Object) return Parts end
function GetTotalMass(Object) local Parts = GetAllConnectedParts(Object) local Mass = 0 for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end end Mass = (Mass * Gravity) return Mass end
function MousePressed(Down) if Down and not MouseDown then local Jetpack = Tool:FindFirstChild("JetpackModel") if not Jetpack then return end MouseDown = true local Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera for i, v in pairs({BodyVelocity, BodyGyro, DescendantAdded, DescendantRemoving}) do if tostring(v) == "Connection" then v:disconnect() elseif type(v) == "userdata" and v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end DescendantAdded = Character.DescendantAdded:connect(function(Object) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end local Mass = GetTotalMass(Torso) BodyVelocity.P = (Mass * 10) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P) end) DescendantRemoving = Character.DescendantRemoving:connect(function(Object) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end local Mass = GetTotalMass(Torso) BodyVelocity.P = (Mass * 10) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, BodyVelocity.P, 0) end) Flying = true BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.P = GetTotalMass(Torso) * 10 BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = Torso BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyGyro.D = 50 BodyGyro.P = 10000 BodyGyro.Parent = Torso Spawn(function() InvokeServer("BeginFlight") end) DisableJump(true) while Flying and MouseDown and ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and Jetpack and Jetpack.Parent do BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) local CoordinateFrame = Camera.CFrame local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = CastRay(RootPart.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (RootPart.Size.Y * 15), {Character}) if not RayHit then BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P) local TorsoCFrame = RootPart.CFrame local Dir = (TorsoCFrame.lookVector * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) local FlightDirection = Camera.CFrame.lookVector FlightDirection = (FlightDirection * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) local FlightCFrame = (CFrame.new(RootPart.Position, (RootPart.CFrame + FlightDirection * 2).p) * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), (math.pi * 2), 0)) BodyVelocity.velocity = (CoordinateFrame.lookVector * 75) if tostring(FlightCFrame.p.X) ~= "-1.#IND" and FlightCFrame.p.Y ~= "-1.#IND" and FlightCFrame.p.Z ~= "-1.#IND" then BodyGyro.cframe = FlightCFrame end if not Sounds.Wind.IsPlaying then Sounds.Wind:Play() end else BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, BodyVelocity.P, 0) if Sounds.Wind.IsPlaying then Sounds.Wind:Stop() end BodyVelocity.velocity = ((CoordinateFrame.lookVector.Unit * Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) * 50) BodyGyro.cframe = CoordinateFrame end wait(Rate) end Flying = false DisableJump(false) Sounds.Wind:Stop() Spawn(function() InvokeServer("EndFlight") end) if CheckIfAlive() then Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall) end for i, v in pairs({BodyVelocity, BodyGyro, DescendantAdded, DescendantRemoving}) do if tostring(v) == "Connection" then v:disconnect() elseif type(v) == "userdata" and v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end elseif not Down and MouseDown then MouseDown = false end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") RootPart = Humanoid.RootPart ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() MousePressed(true) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MousePressed(false) end) HumanoidDied = Humanoid.Died:connect(function() Unequipped() end) local LastJump = 0 local FlightInProgress = false local PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then InputCheckClone = InputCheck:Clone() InputCheckClone.InputButton.InputBegan:connect(function() MousePressed(true) end) InputCheckClone.InputButton.InputEnded:connect(function() MousePressed(false) end) InputCheckClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end -- SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", Animations.IdleMovement) end
function Unequipped() Flying = false if CheckIfAlive() then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end if InputCheckClone and InputCheckClone.Parent then InputCheckClone:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(AnimationTracks) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end for i, v in pairs({BodyVelocity, BodyGyro}) do if v and v.Parent then Debris:AddItem(v, 0.1) end end for i, v in pairs({HumanoidDied, DescendantAdded, DescendantRemoving, PreventJump}) do if tostring(v) == "Connection" then v:disconnect() elseif type(v) == "userdata" and v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end AnimationTracks = {} ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) return ServerReturn end) end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target} end end
workspace:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Gravity"):Connect(function() Gravity = workspace.Gravity end) ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Smoke = script:WaitForChild("Smoke") Smoke.Enabled = false
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Sounds = { InitialThrust = Handle:WaitForChild("InitialThrust"), }
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Flying = false ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function CreateJetpack(Create) for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if (v:IsA("BasePart") or v:IsA("Model")) and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end if Create then JetpackModel = Instance.new("Model") JetpackModel.Name = "JetpackModel" JetpackBody = BasePart:Clone() JetpackBody.Name = "Body" JetpackBody.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 0.2) local BodyMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") BodyMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh BodyMesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "358561633") BodyMesh.TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "358561835") BodyMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) BodyMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) BodyMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyMesh.Parent = JetpackBody JetpackLeftWing = JetpackBody:Clone() JetpackLeftWing.Name = "LeftWing" JetpackLeftWing.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "358561494") JetpackLeftWing.Parent = JetpackModel JetpackRightWing = JetpackBody:Clone() JetpackRightWing.Name = "RightWing" JetpackRightWing.Mesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "358561439") JetpackRightWing.Parent = JetpackModel LeftMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") LeftMotor.Name = "LeftMotor" LeftMotor.Part0 = JetpackBody LeftMotor.Part1 = JetpackLeftWing LeftMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(-1.20348334, -0.147620395, -0.932994068, -1, 0, -8.74227766e-008, 0, 1, 0, 8.74227766e-008, 0, -1) LeftMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(1.48662543, -0.147634506, -0.742988586, -1.00000381, -3.57627869e-007, -1.1920929e-007, 4.47034836e-007, 1, -4.47034836e-008, -4.84287739e-008, 1.04308128e-007, -1.00000107) LeftMotor.Parent = JetpackBody RightMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") RightMotor.Name = "RightMotor" RightMotor.Part0 = JetpackBody RightMotor.Part1 = JetpackRightWing RightMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(1.34692574, -0.126448825, 0.978314459, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) RightMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(-1.36299276, -0.126451492, 1.16832352, 1.00000405, -3.57627869e-007, 3.7252903e-008, 0, 1, 1.49011612e-008, 8.19563866e-008, 8.94069672e-008, 1.00000119) RightMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.01 RightMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 RightMotor.CurrentAngle = RightMotor.DesiredAngle RightMotor.Parent = JetpackBody local BodyWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BodyWeld.Part0 = Torso BodyWeld.Part1 = JetpackBody BodyWeld.C0 = ((CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) * CFrame.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5)) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0)) BodyWeld.C1 = Tool.Grip LeftMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.01 LeftMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 LeftMotor.CurrentAngle = LeftMotor.DesiredAngle BodyWeld.Parent = JetpackBody LeftSmokePart = BasePart:Clone() LeftSmokePart.Name = "LeftSmokePart" LeftSmokePart.Transparency = 1 LeftSmokePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) LeftSmokePart.CanCollide = false LeftSmokePart.Parent = JetpackModel local LeftSmoke = Smoke:Clone() LeftSmoke.Parent = LeftSmokePart local LeftSmokeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") LeftSmokeWeld.Part0 = JetpackBody LeftSmokeWeld.Part1 = LeftSmokePart LeftSmokeWeld.C0 = (CFrame.new(-0.6, -1.25, -0.25) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0)) LeftSmokeWeld.Parent = LeftSmokePart RightSmokePart = BasePart:Clone() RightSmokePart.Name = "RightSmokePart" RightSmokePart.Transparency = 1 RightSmokePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) RightSmokePart.CanCollide = false RightSmokePart.Parent = JetpackModel local RightSmoke = Smoke:Clone() RightSmoke.Parent = RightSmokePart local RightSmokeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") RightSmokeWeld.Part0 = JetpackBody RightSmokeWeld.Part1 = RightSmokePart RightSmokeWeld.C0 = (CFrame.new(0.6, -1.25, -0.25) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0)) RightSmokeWeld.Parent = RightSmokePart JetpackBody.Parent = JetpackModel JetpackModel.Parent = Tool end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Handle.Transparency = 1 Spawn(function() CreateJetpack(true) end) ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() Flying = false Handle.Transparency = 0 CreateJetpack(false) for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do v:Stop() end ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() or not Mode then return end if not JetpackModel or not JetpackModel.Parent then return end if Mode == "BeginFlight" and not Flying then Flying = true Sounds.InitialThrust:Play() for i, v in pairs({LeftSmokePart, RightSmokePart}) do if v and v.Parent then for ii, vv in pairs(v:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then vv.Enabled = true end end end end for i, v in pairs({LeftMotor, RightMotor}) do if v and v.Parent then v.DesiredAngle = 0.25 end end elseif Mode == "EndFlight" and Flying then Flying = false for i, v in pairs({LeftSmokePart, RightSmokePart}) do if v and v.Parent then for ii, vv in pairs(v:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then vv.Enabled = false end end end end for i, v in pairs({LeftMotor, RightMotor}) do if v and v.Parent then v.DesiredAngle = 0 end end end end)
CreateJetpack(false)
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
